name: Snow (itch) (FreakZombie)
description:
Customizable particle generator that simulates snow falling.

The included config file contains options that can be modified to get many different effects. Comments in the file should help describe what each option does.

The snowflake sprite sheet can be modified or replaced to customize what is falling and turn it into something else entirely. Scale, sprite size, and rotation can all be configured. Disable smoothing to make pixel art look better or enable it for more realistic textures.

Fullscreen mode ignores the resolution specified and uses the current desktop resolution, but a width and height still needs to be specified.

Rendering is locked to 60fps and enabling Vsync will help with screen tearing if needed.

Controls:

Escape - Exit

P - Pause/Resume

F1 - Enable/Disable Debug Info
